page.description: Opens and returns a pointer to a toolbar.
page.syntax: <toolbar> as P = toolbar::open(name as C [, flagGlobal as L])
page.discussion: The *[xb:Toolbar::open()]* function opens the specified Toolbar_Name and returns an object pointer to the toolbar.
